promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic serpent water-type pokemon wearing sapphire armor. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Saphydrodra, a a gigantic basic serpent water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Aqua Pump. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "water" or "Saphydrodra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, serpent-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Beneath ocean waves, Saphydrodra, an enormous aquatic leviathan, thrives. It uses Aqua Pump to create whirlpools, ensnaring its prey.
